name: cordova-plugin-webview-checker
author: Attila Olah <NoNameProvided@users.noreply.github.com>
description: Checks whether Android System WebView is installed and enabled or not on Cordova.

scripts.testing:setup: cordova create playground org.cpcwc.playground Playground && cd ./playground && cordova platform add android && cordova plugin add ..
scripts.testing:reset: cd ./playground && cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-webview-checker && cordova plugin add ..
scripts.testing:start: npm run testing:reset && cd ./playground && cordova run android
